content: in this legal case a couple referred to as nk and ak sought a divorce and the division of their joint assets the court made a final decision referred to as court dec which stated that nk would keep a car worth 2500 euros and ak would compensate nk with 1250 euros nk would also be recognized as the sole owner of an apartment ak is required to change the owners entry in the land register to reflect nk as the sole owner the costs of the proceedings will be shared by both parties ak has the option to appeal the courts decision within 30 days the court considered the history of the couples joint assets including apartments that were privatized and exchanged and a car the court found that the claimants request for ownership of the apartment and compensation for the car was justified the court also referred to relevant code articles including those related to the division of joint assets in divorce cases the court ordered ak to provide a statement of intent to change the owners entry in the land register the court also determined that the procedural costs of the case should be shared by the parties involved
